name: The Bank Job
description:
The Bank Job is an X-Com style turn based strategy game . The game currently has one map and allows you to play as either the police or the bank robbers.  You can also play 2 player local multiplayer. Online 2 player multiplayer will come later with release. 

Controls:

Swipe to pan the camera

Pinch to zoom

two fingers can be used to rotate the camera

tap to move the unit to an available square

tap icons to activate abilities like moving, shooting and changing weapons for those units who have two weapons. All units that start with a shotgun can switch to a pistol for increased range but lower damage. 

After selecting a shooting ability, you can double tap a target to fire. 

Units receive cover from some features, like cars, and windows. 

Known Bugs:

Camera is currently a little glitchy. It sometimes jumps around when scrolling. 

Tapping to fire is also glitchy with it sometimes jumping around after tapping. 

Moving is currently a single tap, but it will be changed to a double tap (once to select a square, a second time to move) in the future. 

grid alignment isn't perfect on this map, but that will be changed on future maps.
